com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.plugin

Interface GeneiousPreferences

  • Deprecated. 
    Use PluginPreferences and GeneiousPlugin.getPluginPreferences() instead

    public interface GeneiousPreferences
    A set of preference types (eg. comboboxes, textfields..) which can be displayed to the user in an option dialog or the preferences window.

    GeneiousPreferences may be supplied by a plugin via GeneiousPlugin.getPreferences() or on a per service basis via GeneiousService.getPreferences()

    Use of this class it deprectaed. You should use GeneiousPlugin.getPluginPreferences() instead.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  GeneiousPreferences.GeneiousCheckBoxPreference
      Deprecated. 
      A preference for specifying a yes/no (on/off) choice.
      static class  GeneiousPreferences.GeneiousComboBoxPreference
      Deprecated. 
      A preference for specifying one of a set of values.
      static class  GeneiousPreferences.GeneiousDependentPreference
      Deprecated. 
      A preference which itself contains a list of GeneiousPreferences.GeneiousPreference.
      static class  GeneiousPreferences.GeneiousPreference
      Deprecated. 
      Super class for all GeneiousPreferences.GeneiousPreference types.
      static class  GeneiousPreferences.GeneiousRadioButtonPreference
      Deprecated. 
      A preference for specifying one of a small set of possible values.
      static class  GeneiousPreferences.GeneiousStringPreference
      Deprecated. 
      A preference for specifying a string.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GeneiousPreferences.GeneiousPreference[] getPreferences()
      Deprecated. 
      Get GeneiousPreferences.GeneiousPreferences which will be displayed to the user.
      String setValue(String code, boolean value)
      Deprecated. 
      Called for each GeneiousPreferences.GeneiousCheckBoxPreference in these preferences when the user confirms by clicking OK and each time the program is started up (before initialisation).
      String setValue(String code, String value)
      Deprecated. 
      Called for each GeneiousPreferences.GeneiousPreference, excluding GeneiousPreferences.GeneiousCheckBoxPreference, in these preferences when the user confirms by clicking OK and each time the program is started up (before initialisation).

    • Method Detail

      • getPreferences

        GeneiousPreferences.GeneiousPreference[] getPreferences()
        Deprecated. 
        Get GeneiousPreferences.GeneiousPreferences which will be displayed to the user.
        Returns:
        an array of GeneiousPreferences.GeneiousPreferences to display. cannot be null

      • setValue

        String setValue(String code,
              String value)
        Deprecated. 
        Called for each GeneiousPreferences.GeneiousPreference, excluding GeneiousPreferences.GeneiousCheckBoxPreference, in these preferences when the user confirms by clicking OK and each time the program is started up (before initialisation). It is not necessary to save these persistantly, this is handled by the program.
        Parameters:
        code - of the preference to set the value for
        value - to set the preference to
        Returns:
        null if the value was set successfully, or an error message if unsuccessful

      • setValue

        String setValue(String code,
              boolean value)
        Deprecated. 
        Called for each GeneiousPreferences.GeneiousCheckBoxPreference in these preferences when the user confirms by clicking OK and each time the program is started up (before initialisation). It is not necessary to save these persistantly, this is handled by the program.
        Parameters:
        code - of the preference to set the value for
        value - to set the preference to
        Returns:
        null if the value was set successfully, or an error message if unsuccessful
